narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Renmax Transport LLC is a Non-emergency Medical Transport (VAN) provider based in Leesburg, VA. From 2019-11 through 2024-11, this provider received $131K in Medicaid payments across 2K claims serving 219 beneficiaries, billing 1 distinct procedure codes.

narrative.title: Key Findings
items: Bills 2.3× the national median for A0130 (A0130), at $67 per claim vs. the median of $29, placing them above the 75th percentile.
100% of billing is concentrated in A0130 (A0130), indicating significant specialization in this service.
Spending grew 691% from $14K in 2019 to $107K in 2024.
Saw a 10.4× spike in 2024 ($10K → $107K), a sharp year-over-year increase.
